io.spine.tools.mc.js.code.field.precondition

Class FieldPrecondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.mc.js.code.field.precondition.FieldPrecondition

  • public abstract class FieldPrecondition
extends java.lang.Object
    The generator of the code which performs various checks on the proto field value.
    API Note:
    The descendants are supposed to operate on the provided CodeWriter, so the interface methods are not returning any generated code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void exitNullCheck()
      Generates the code to exit the null check block and return to the upper level.
      abstract void performNullCheck(java.lang.String value, java.lang.String mergeFieldFormat)
      Generates the code which checks the given field value for null.
      static FieldPrecondition preconditionFor(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor field, CodeWriter writer)
      Creates a new precondition for the given field.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • performNullCheck

        public abstract void performNullCheck(java.lang.String value,
                                      java.lang.String mergeFieldFormat)
        Generates the code which checks the given field value for null.

        The merge field format is specified so the precondition can interact with the field itself in case the check passes/fails.

        Parameters:
        value - the name of the variable representing the field value to check
        mergeFieldFormat - the code that sets/adds value to the field

      • exitNullCheck

        public abstract void exitNullCheck()
        Generates the code to exit the null check block and return to the upper level.

      • preconditionFor

        public static FieldPrecondition preconditionFor(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor field,
                                                CodeWriter writer)
        Creates a new precondition for the given field.
        Parameters:
        field - the descriptor of the Protobuf field to create the precondition for
        writer - the JsOutput which will accumulate all the generated code
        Returns:
        a FieldPrecondition of the appropriate type
